A4.text: Georgia Aquarium is a public aquarium in Atlanta, Georgia, United States.

A5.text: The aquarium exhibits hundreds of species and thousands of animals across its seven major galleries, all of which reside in more than 11 million US gallons (42,000 m3) of water.
